Articles.Content: I absolutely love KSP and have been waiting 2 years for this fix/update/whatever and put about 12 hours into my new career sence its re-release and just got this message when i went to load my game (Unable to load save MZRNCYBDSTD7ETLHWYY2ZVEVSG) has this happened to anyone else and or can someone please help!
I woke up this morning so happy to play KSP. Now it looks like we're going down this path again

56 minutes ago, HBushton said:

I woke up this morning so happy to play KSP. Now it looks like we're going down this path again 

Did u have the same thing happen?
Not managed to get far enough into the game to actually bother reloading it as yet
I was able to load a few times but about the third day it gave that message i posted

If anyone is experiencing the same issue please report it on this page because this issue is very far and few between and hopefully the more that we talked about it the faster it will be fixed

Edited January 21, 2018 by GriffKiller

Iv'e already restarted due to this happening aswell.

Although I think it may  have been my fault. Every so often I'll do a purge of my save games.

I usually make a new save then delete all but a few of my previous saves. However on this occasion I actually deleted them all, including the persistent(which I never do, i try to be extra careful with my saves since last port)

I always leave the persistent the quick save and obv my new save ,but this time I got the unable to load save thing you'e talking about.

But like I say have a funny feeling it's because I deleted the persistent save.

Either way just reporting this as a possible way for debug team to replicate this .

Could you tell me what platform are you all playing on?

 

Cheers!

6 minutes ago, ArrrThePirate said:

Could you tell me what platform are you all playing on?

 

Cheers!

Me on Xbox 

6 minutes ago, ArrrThePirate said:

Iv'e already restarted due to this happening aswell.

Although I think it may  have been my fault. Every so often I'll do a purge of my save games.

I usually make a new save then delete all but a few of my previous saves. However on this occasion I actually deleted them all, including the persistent(which I never do, i try to be extra careful with my saves since last port)

I always leave the persistent the quick save and obv my new save ,but this time I got the unable to load save thing you'e talking about.

But like I say have a funny feeling it's because I deleted the persistent save.

Either way just reporting this as a possible way for debug team to replicate this .

I just set up a test career did one mission, saved and then deleated the persistent save ill hop on it twice a day do a mission and see what happens. Ill do this for a week an get back to yall.

6 hours ago, ArrrThePirate said:

Could you tell me what platform are you all playing on?

 

Cheers!

Aye aye capn, the demon bug ye seek bides in scorpio bay. ARRR.

(Sorry couldn't help myself, I've been playing  sea of thieves lately)

On 1/22/2018 at 8:51 AM, GriffKiller said:
On 1/22/2018 at 3:50 AM, mikey117 said:

Iv'e already restarted due to this happening aswell.

Although I think it may  have been my fault. Every so often I'll do a purge of my save games.

I usually make a new save then delete all but a few of my previous saves. However on this occasion I actually deleted them all, including the persistent(which I never do, i try to be extra careful with my saves since last port)

I always leave the persistent the quick save and obv my new save ,but this time I got the unable to load save thing you'e talking about.

But like I say have a funny feeling it's because I deleted the persistent save.

Either way just reporting this as a possible way for debug team to replicate this .

I just set up a test career did one mission, saved and then deleated the persistent save ill hop on it twice a day do a mission and see what happens. Ill do this for a week an get back to yall.

UPDATE!!! I successfully managed to break my save file on my test career by deleting the present save and dash bording to xbox home screen, i took a day or two but that where the bug is i think. Also im going to create another and test it again. Also also my reg career is running great and loading no prob.

15 hours ago, GriffKiller said:

UPDATE!!! I successfully managed to break my save file on my test career by deleting the present save and dash bording to xbox home screen, i took a day or two but that where the bug is i think. Also im going to create another and test it again. Also also my reg career is running great and loading no prob.

that shouldn't be possible! We just tested it and it indeed breaks your save file, the 'delete' button should be disabled when you select your persistent save.

Nice find!
Happy to help make my favorite game work, thanx bud, aslo Mikey117 helped too

2 hours ago, GriffKiller said:

Happy to help make my favorite game work, thanx bud, aslo Mikey117 helped too

The PS4 ominously, dosen't seem to have any bugs, none of these bug reports seem to be on PS4... as for me, I haven't even seen any major bugs.

19 minutes ago, DunaManiac said:

The PS4 ominously, dosen't seem to have any bugs, none of these bug reports seem to be on PS4... as for me, I haven't even seen any major bugs.

Games ported to Xbox like 7 Days To Die, KSP (and others) have MD5 errors for some reason and it doesnt happen to PS4 idk why.

2 hours ago, DunaManiac said:

The PS4 ominously, dosen't seem to have any bugs, none of these bug reports seem to be on PS4... as for me, I haven't even seen any major bugs.

The ps4 Version also has bugs, ran into some, I had it a few times that u couldnt save or leave your Vessel.

Just now, PrvDancer85 said:

The ps4 Version also has bugs, ran into some, I had it a few times that u couldnt save or leave your Vessel. 

Ya i was talking about saves corrupting. Theres bugs galore on both versions but i can work around bugs like cockpit hatche click box being the whole cockpit and some controller bugs ext. it is KSP after all and the Kraken is alive and angry even on the PC version, you just gotta know how to handle her.

24 minutes ago, GriffKiller said:

Theres bugs galore on both versions

I disagree.

27 minutes ago, GriffKiller said:

Ya i was talking about saves corrupting. Theres bugs galore on both versions but i can work around bugs like cockpit hatche click box being the whole cockpit and some controller bugs ext. it is KSP after all and the Kraken is alive and angry even on the PC version, you just gotta know how to handle her.

So far no corruption, the can Not save or load Vessel thingy is the Most mayor one I've encountered

19 hours ago, DunaManiac said:

I disagree.

Do you care to elaborate?

On 1/25/2018 at 11:08 AM, GriffKiller said:

Do you care to elaborate?

Agreed. This person either doesn't play console, play seriously, or hasn't seen the overwhelming frustration of console players in this forum. 

I haven't played KSP on console yet (KSP or KSPEE) without encountering a GAMEBREAKING bug (not to mention the annoying bugs that have workarounds).

Edited February 3, 2018 by Joessep Kerman
Yaaaaa no delete button over the persistent save GO TEAM SQUAD!!!

Earlier today I loaded up kerbal space program Enhanced Edition on my Xbox One and went into continue game, and in the save slot were all my (world) saves should it was completely empty.

I hope someone knows about a fix,

Thanks for your time.

On 4/29/2018 at 1:12 AM, dementatron21 said:

Earlier today I loaded up kerbal space program Enhanced Edition on my Xbox One and went into continue game, and in the save slot were all my (world) saves should it was completely empty.

I hope someone knows about a fix,

Thanks for your time.

As far as I know there's no fix if there gone there gone sadly... I to have lost many a worlds in the past :(. But to maby help it not happen again did you do anything out of the norm with your save files when u last played?

PS4 console player here.

As far as I know the saved file problems for console were fixed in the last patch.

One of the methods of avoiding the majority of those problems was to always back out to the main loading page before exiting the game.
